Description: Basic Chemical Industries Co (known as: BCI) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2008. BCI operates within the Materials sector focusing on Diversified Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. BCI is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1973.
